item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-05
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Red Bones (55 Chester St, Somerville). #
  • Redbones in Davis Square #
  • Hushpuppies @ Red Bones BBQ #
  • Mint Julep @ Red Bones BBQ #
  • Corn bread @ Red Bones BBQ #
  • Pulled Pork sandwhich @ Red Bones BBQ #
  • I'm at Diesel Cafe (257 Elm St, at Chester St, Somerville). #
  • My iced tea is protected #
  • Walking with puppy #
  • photo.jpg #
  • photo.jpg #
  • Does Google have an Adsense app for the iphone? That would be sweet. #
  • Hooray Jedi is on! Nothing says Happy Birthday USA like ewoks & Han Solo. #
  • RT: THERE IS A MONCHICHI ON THE WING OF THIS PLANE! My best, Bill. (via @wilw) #
  • I'm at Diesel Cafe (257 Elm St, at Chester St, Somerville). #
  • Monorail crash in Disney's Magic Kingdom kills cast member - #
  • Reading: How to create small, unique tokens in Ruby - #ruby #tip #programming #
  • I'm at Eastern Standard (528 Commonwealth Ave, Boston). #
  • Whisky Smash @ Eastern Standard #
  • Smoked Salmon on plain bagel w/ cream cheese, tomatoes & capers #
  • Fruit salad @ Eastern Standard #
  • I'm at Kiehl's (112 Newbury Street, Clarendon Street, Boston). #
  • I'm at L'Aroma Cafe (85 Newbury, Boston). #
  • Iced green tea @ L' Aroma #
